body.p: An Irish-born, Kentucky farmer. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Eliza Burk. Father of Joseph Burk, Thomas Burk, Fanny Burk, Bridget Burk, Margaret Burk, Mary Burk, and John Burk.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 41; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville Voting District, p. 11.
